Self.Wiki: Determines the handling of garage cutscenes.

disableParam_NT.Wiki: Exclude from the NT version or mark the ones to be excluded.

disableParam_Product.Wiki: Exclude from the product version or mark the items to be excluded.

defualtSortieCutSceneID.Wiki: The default cutscene to play when starting a mission.

defaultReturnCutSceneID.Wiki: The default cutscene to play when ending a mission.

defualtReturnOmitCutSceneID.Wiki: The default cutscene to play when failing a mission.

sortieCutSceneID1.Wiki: A variant of the starting cutscene.

sortieCutSceneID2.Wiki: A variant of the starting cutscene.

sortieCutSceneID3.Wiki: A variant of the starting cutscene.

sortieCutSceneID4.Wiki: A variant of the starting cutscene.

sortieCutSceneID5.Wiki: A variant of the starting cutscene.

sortieCutSceneID6.Wiki: A variant of the starting cutscene.

sortieCutSceneID7.Wiki: A variant of the starting cutscene.

sortieCutSceneID8.Wiki: A variant of the starting cutscene.

returnCutSceneID1.Wiki: A variant of the ending cutscene.

returnCutSceneID2.Wiki: A variant of the ending cutscene.

returnCutSceneID3.Wiki: A variant of the ending cutscene.

returnCutSceneID4.Wiki: A variant of the ending cutscene.

returnCutSceneID5.Wiki: A variant of the ending cutscene.

returnCutSceneID6.Wiki: A variant of the ending cutscene.

returnCutSceneID7.Wiki: A variant of the ending cutscene.

returnCutSceneID8.Wiki: A variant of the ending cutscene.
